title: Frequently, usually late night and early morning, there is an awful odor in the air.  It definitely affects my sinuses.  It smells somewhat like cat litter.  I live down town, about three blocks from the river.  The odor is worse when the air is heavy and hanging low.  My neighbors also are bothered by this emission into the air.  Which company/industry is responsible for this emission?
